name: webscraping-aero
description: Web scraping para buscar passagens no site seats.aero

scripts.postinstall: apt update && apt install -y libnss3 libatk1.0-0 libx11-xcb1 libxcomposite1 libxcursor1 libxdamage1 libxfixes3 libxi6 libxrandr2 libxrender1 libasound2 libpango-1.0-0 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libgtk-3-0 libdrm2 && npx puppeteer browsers install chrome

author: Nathan
